transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji sir Pradyut Singh baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir main Nancy baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager IndiaMART head office se. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Kahan se aap?
Executive: IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji. Bas badhiya aur theek hai. Haan ji sir aapka call aaya hua tha Friday ko, 14 din off tha, to connect nahi kar paye.
Executive: Okay. Continue, mam, ye abhi skip ho gaya mam.
Customer: No issue. Main actually na abhi mere mind se skip ho gaya kya reason tha. To main koi baat nahi agar hua to main call back kar lunga aapko.
Executive: Nahi abhi koi issue to nahi hai na sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi, no issue.
Executive: No issue na? To bhi kal call sir galti se lag gaya tha kya?
Customer: Maybe. Kal laga tha ya matlab Friday ko sir jis din apna welcome call hua tha na, usi din aapne call matlab laga diya tha mujhe.
Executive: Okay. Galti ho gaya tha.
Executive: Achha. Sir mujhe ek baat aur batao ki customer ke bhi call aa rahe hain sir aapke paas wo bhi aap receive nahi kar rahe ho?
Customer: Nahi maine actually mam ek kiya tha tab tak customer ka phone aur dobara se maine call back kiya to pick nahi kiya customer ne.
Executive: Sir kahan se call back karte ho aap? Direct karte ho ya phir lead manager mein jaake call back karte ho?
Customer: Nahi jo maine jo call aayi hoti hai maine seedhe call back kar deta hu.
Executive: Nahi sir. Waise to roz kar rahe hain. Jo jo lead aa rahi hai wo to roz hi call kar rahe hain hum.
Executive: Achha achha. Kuch achha response wagera theek hai abhi sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan haan. Sab to theek hai. Aur sir
Executive: Sorry. Main ye keh rahi thi sir ke aapka jo aap call back karte ho na wo lead manager se jaake kiya karo. Lead manager mein jaise hi aap jaoge na all contacts ka option hota hai upar. Uspe aap click karoge to wahan pe outgoing, incoming aur missed teen option aate hain. Aapko na missed pe click karna hai.
Customer: Okay. Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Missed pe aap jab click karoge, haan to aapko pata bhi chal jayega kaun si company ka call aaya hai, kahan se aaya hai sab. To ek baar aapko wo idea ho jaata hai. Abhi customer kya karta hai aapke na sir IndiaMART buyer wale number pe call karta hai. To sometimes wo pick nahi hota hai.
Customer: Okay. Aati rehti hai aisa kuch nahi hai. Ye ho sakta hai ki call busy chal rahi ho na ho otherwise to aisa matlab nahi hai. Ek hi call aayi thi mere paas wo to maine pick kar diya tha.
Executive: Achha aur sir koi baat nahi mam ek baar check kar lijiye. Ek baar check kar lijiye.
Executive: Haan aur sir dusri baat hai ki aapke na inquiry bhi kaafi aa rahi hai. Matlab lead manager maine aapko samjhaya tha na ki saamne se customer ko message karta hai to use inquiry kehte hain. To wo bhi aa raha hai. Haan wo aa raha hai. Aap apna ek baar lead manager check kar lena. Theek hai? Abhi is week
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Sir abhi aaj Lead pe bhi to waise maine kiya tha mam message na. Wahan pe jo aa rahi thi wo humne saari matlab kar di thi call back kar di thi kiya tha 10-15 to na.
Executive: Achha lead pe kiya hoga na sir call inquiry pe kar diya tha?
Customer: Lead pe hi kiya tha. Inquiry pe nahi kiya. Inquiry pe alag aayega ya lead manager pe aayega wahan pe wahi pe?
Executive: Haan inquiry lead manager pe aayega. Same aise aata hai jaise koi WhatsApp pe aapko message karta hai na to one indicator aa jaata hai green color se. Lead manager mein blue ya green matlab phone mein hoga to green se aayega, desktop pe hoga to blue se aayega aisa kuch hota hai. To uske jaise hi aayenge na aapko one aa jayega to aap unhe call bhi karna hai sir. Kyunki wo direct customer hai.
Customer: Okay. Okay.
Executive: Hai na? Buy lead ka sir matlab hota hai ki customer ne requirement IndiaMART pe daali hai. To IndiaMART usko buy lead bana ke daal deta hai. Jo pehle char seller usko consume kar lenge unse deal ho jayega. Inquiry ka matlab hota hai customer particular aapki company pe aaya hai direct.
Customer: Okay. Okay.
Executive: Theek hai inquiry aur calls ka. To aap thoda sa inquiry pe bhi call karo. Theek hai? Aur baki maine aapko bataya hi tha sir ke mere call ke aapko 15 din baad aapko unka phone aayega catalog production team ka catalog designing ke liye. To abhi aur koi product wagera to add nahi karane?
Customer: Nahi product to hai mam kaafi actually add karne wale na. Abhi kuch kuch main kar raha hu apne aap aur baki list bana leta hu main saari wo main share kar denge.
Executive: List bana ke rakh lo. Aap se matlab wahi mano 10 December tak aapko call aa jayega. To aap unhe na material de dena photos ho gaye aur jo bhi product wagera infrastructure ke images wagera bhi aap picture karke rakh lena. Theek hai? To wo bhi jo bhi rahenge aap unhe de dena.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Theek hai wo add karenge aur aapka catalog matlab ek baar achhe se ban jayega na to aur achha call aata hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Chal theek hai sir aaj valid wagera use kar lena kaafi fresh valid aayi hui hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji mam ek baar karunga. Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai mam thank you.
Executive: Okay welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not receiving customer calls.

- Customer was unaware of inquiry feature.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use lead manager.

- Executive explained the difference between buy leads and inquiries.

- Executive informed about catalog production team call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check lead manager for inquiries.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiry, lead manager, catalog
